title: Recovery or enchanted armor mastery on aatrox?
body:
Been playing alot of him, and i'm confused on which one i should get on him. You need to get some tanky items on him after offensive ones and 5% increased bonus mr/armor isn't alot but at level 18 it could be about 5 armor or MR.

However, i could see recovery(slightly more hp regen) being helpful all until the late game. So which one is better on him?
